name: Tears-offcial-release
description:
Fatoft presents:

A 2D SpeedRunning platformer where enemies cant shoot you when they see you but to get paid you gotta kill them all and escape the area as soon as possible.

In tutorial section you can learn how to win and practice your skills

In Levels you gotta make that money

Tutorial:

WASD move and jump as expected

E grapple 

W while grappling cancels grapple and momentum

Space while grappling cancels grapple but keeps momentum

* To open doors you have to grapple toward them

Left Click shoots enemies

* to win the level all enemies should die and your score will be your time. for now game dont have any save system but will be added.

* Please leave a comment and tell your thoughts on how can i improve and how was the game and did you enjoy it? ty <3

Important Note:

* this game is not complete and it is in development. for now i am developing version 0.6 and core gameplay is there but polish and music and extra features are lacking

* sorry for bad quality
